channel.title: Batch help again, For organizing file's for a cleaner look, Really need
channel.description:
Ok how do i make my batch file that "runs" the server and load the files from a whole directory instead of one.
This is what i have.
[code] @echo off color 0a title Run the server. cd Source/Bin java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server [/code]
And it only loads the bin folder..but if i take the "bin" extension off it won't go into that folder, I need it to search all sub-folders inside a folder for the files it's looking for. (if that makes since..:()
